labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Menu opens, height is unlimited, there's no scroll bar.
data.expected_result: Menu opens, height is limited, allows you to scroll through options.
data.short_description: Filters in server settings don't limit their size and extend to length of what's contained in the filter menus, off-screen if long enough, unable to scroll
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Audit Log/Members in Server Settings for any server you have permissions for - Attempt to change the "Filter by User", "Filter by Action", or "Display Role:" selectors. - you expect the height of the selector be unlimited and the scroll bar not be where it should be.
